Title: Kwara engages stakeholders on business reforms as PEBEC reviews progress
Summary: Kwara State Government hosted a one-day town hall meeting and technical workshop aimed at deepening public understanding and collaboration on the State Action on Business Enabling Reforms (SABER) SBER is a key component of Nigeria’s ongoing efforts to improve business performance .

Title: Ebonyi ADC chairman vows to dismantle APC
Summary: Ebonyi ADC chairman vows to dismantle APC . Dr. Jennifer Nwafor said the adoption of the party by coalition partners as their platform to wrest power from the All Progressives Congress (APC) has been a disaster .

Title: Naira stabilises amid rising investor confidence in economic reforms
Summary: Nigeria’s naira has shown signs of stabilisation in recent months, diverging from global oil price trends, according to a new Bloomberg report . Analysts say the narrowa's relatively flatness signals a shift in the currency's traditional dependence on crude earnings .

Title: ADC coalition led by disgruntle politicians, says NCCC
Summary: The North Central Citizens Council (NCCC) criticised the newly formed opposition coalition led by former Vice President Atiku Abubakar . NCCC described it as a ‘coalition of confusion’ composed of “disgruntled political actors .

Title: APC praises Agbomhere for role in Okpebholo’s victory
Summary: APC praises Dr. Blessing Agbomhere for his contribution to Governor Monday Okpebholo’s victory in last year's governorship election . The publicity secretary of the Edo State chapter of the APC has been the party's publicity secretary .

Title: 97 lawyers line up to defend ADC, Mark, Aregbesola against APC’s ‘fake lawsuit’
Summary: The African Democratic Congress (ADC) has assembled a team of 97 lawyers to challenge what it describes as the All Progressives Congress (APC)’s ‘fake lawsuit’ against its interim leadership . Former Senate President David Mark and former Minister Rauf Aregbesola will be defended .

Title: 2027: ADC won’t handover structures to Atiku, Obi, Amaechi, others – Lukman
Summary: The coalition and 2027 are not all about producing candidates who will end up producing another disappointment, Lukman says . "The coalition is basically about producing unaccountable leaders"

Title: Meet Olaolu Slawn, first artist in the world to have his artwork on an F1 race car
Summary: Olaolu Akeredolu-Ale, better known as Slawn, has made history as the first artist ever to have his artwork featured on a Formula 1 race car .

Title: Shooting spree in Auchi poly SUG election, management denies death
Summary: Shooting spree marred election into Students Union Government (SUG) The Federal Polytechnic Auchi, however, denied any death contrary to online reports . Peter Obi is the 202 presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi .

Title: Deportation: Senate seeks redress for Nigerian businessman Igwe Nwaokpara
Summary: Senate urges Foreign Affairs Ministry to Intensify Diplomatic Efforts with Kenya …Summons Immigration CG Over Non-Compliance with Court Judgment . Senate has called on Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, Bianca Ojukwu, to intensify diplomatic engagement with the Kenyan government .
